response.job_title: Project Management | Grid Software | Digitalization | Software
response.summary: Semi senior project manager with C1 certificate of English proficiency and experience in projects of software, scada, digitalization and electrical control and protection. Experience in financial control, contract management, customer negotiation, consortium and intra-company business models and management of project’s teams of different cultures and locations around south and north America. I am a proactive and fully dedicated person, always focusing on teamwork skills, leadership, assertive communication, resilience, and healthy environment.
response.skills: Agile Methodologies, Scrum, German, Microsoft Office, Project Management, Team Leadership, Ingeniería eléctrica, Strategic Planning, Renewable Energy, Project Planning, Energy, Programming, Contract Management, Report Writing, Resolución de problemas, Ingeniería, Gestión de proyectos, Ventas, Gestión de proveedores, Finanzas

profile_positions.description:
* Manage scope, budget, and schedule of electrical control and protection, scada and software energy projects for private and state companies from the energy market within central and south America.
* Manage project teams from different locations, cultures, and language to fulfill the project needs within scope and schedule.
* Responsible of negotiations with customers within contractual obligations or additional opportunities.
* Strategic assess and select provides to support and complement project teams.
* Constantly provide updates of forecast and project’s plans having into account business unit targets and necessities.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
* Support services projects for Colombia, Peru and Ecuador.
* Manage spare parts projects of maximum USD 135.000, considering factory coordination, customer relation, schedule and budget.
* Develop a dynamic dashboard to improve the follow up of all the projects in the area.
profile_positions.title: Operations and Tendering Intern

profile_positions.description:
* Responsible for business to customer relations with Scotiabank Canada users.
* Analyze inquiries, doubts, or questions from customers regarding their bank accounts and provide support, solutions, and consultancy in a timely manner.
* Focus on deliver the best customer experience during all the calls
profile_positions.title: Customer Care Advisor

company.name: Siemens
company.description:
Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.
In fiscal 2022, which ended on September 30, 2022, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €72.0 billion and net income of €4.4 billion. As of September 30, 2022, the company had around 311,000 employees worldwide. Further information is available at www.siemens.com.
